<div class="cnn_strycntntlft">
<!--startclickprintexclude-->
<!--endclickprintexclude--><!--google_ad_section_start--><!--startclickprintinclude-->
<p><strong>Tehran, Iran (CNN)</strong> -- Iran test-fired a long-range, shore-to-sea missile on Monday, the final day of its naval exercises in the Strait of Hormuz, state-run media reported.</p>
<p>The Ghader missile was fired during the "power" stage of the maneuvers, according to the Islamic Republic News Agency. It hit its intended targets, according to the report.</p>
<p>A short-range Nasr missile would also be test fired, along with a surface-to-surface Noor missile, IRNA said.</p>

<!--endclickprintinclude--><!--google_ad_section_end-->
<!--no partner-->
